name: h3
description: Introducing the 2026 Louisville Slugger Select PWR BBCOR Baseball Bat, a top-tier choice for high school and college players seeking unparalleled performance. This bat features a slightly end-loaded swing feel, thanks to its two-piece hybrid construction with an alloy barrel and composite handle, ensuring powerful hits with every swing. The EXD Alloy Barrel boasts a massive sweet spot and exceptional pop, while the 3FX-PWR Connection enhances comfort and energy transfer. With its SPD-Gen3 End Cap and Pro Design Knob Taper, this bat is engineered for optimized barrel performance, improved control, and maximum swing momentum. Finished in a striking black, grey, and red colorway, the Select PWR is equipped with a Premium PRO Comfort Grip for superior tack and cushioning, making it a standout choice for any serious player. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
